name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save highlighted text from any websites

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save highlighted text from any websites effortlessly with simple keystrokes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly save highlighted text from any website with simple keystrokes.

This is a content-first bookmarking extension that enables you to easily save, annotate, organize, and retrieve the most valuable information you discovered while browsing the Internet.

The content-first design is specifically engineered to save your time and effort in retrieving information you need.

While many bookmarking managers emphasize on saving entire webpages for the users to read later, this extension enables users to save summaries, or the most important notes, from browsed webpages.

Specifically, this extension enables you to save URLs with selected content, either by pressing the hotkey Ctrl/Command + B, or by clicking the icon on the tool bar.

☆☆ Features ☆☆
• Ctrl(Windows)/Command(Mac) + B to quickly save URLs
• If there is any selected content, save it along with the URL
• The saved content can be accessed and edited at yolodb.com
• Full text search of your saved content is available at yolodb.com
• Duplication detection: by clicking the icon on the toolbar, you can view a history of selected content or notes that were saved for the current URL
• Registration for yoloDB is not mandatory to try out this extension. However, you must log in to manage your list
